title: Thunderlords Decree
body:
Just as a note to everyone, try to not have multiple Thunderlord's Decree's on one team, there is currently a bug with it that will cause it to only work for one person.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/RRHPEtl1-thunderlords-decree-game-breaking-bug-gameplay
